question: In which among the following states, the Sports Ministry is set to establish the Khelo India Centre of Excellence (KISCE)?
explanation: The Sports Ministry of Government of India is all set to establish the Khelo India Centre of Excellence (KISCE) in Meghalaya and five more states, under the ministryâ€™s flagship Khelo India scheme. Besides Meghalaya, five other states of Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu, Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Assam and Sikkim.
